Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by deserey Hi everyone ! I'm brand new here & scared ! My first mammo post breast reduction (1 yr ago), shows "cluster of microcalcifications, associated with a slight density." brad4. Biopsy suggested. I'm hoping this is related to the surgery, as the clusters are "retroaerolar" & this is close to where my breast was cut during surgery. Can anyone help me with info about this ? My biopsy is scheduled for next friday. Thanks ! Hi there! I know it's very hard to not be scared, but I was in EXACTLY your position for the last few weeks. My mammo showed a cluster of microcals, birad 4. I had a stereotactic biopsy, and the waiting was killing me...my doctor called me last Friday and told me all was okay - I had fibrocystic reaction to my breast reduction of 2 years ago! I just have to watch for changes and keep all my appointments. So, try to be positive, it CAN be okay!!!
Posts.Title: Microcalcifications after breast reduction
